content.text:
# Jekerkwartier

-->
| footnotes               =
}}
The Jekerkwartier (;  ) is a neighbourhood in the old city centre of Maastricht, Limburg, Netherlands. It is named after the Jeker river that flows through the neighbourhood into the Meuse.
